reviewText: I sat down to watch Chef and Father DVD while nursing my 3-month old daughter. When Greg's voice started, my daughter stopped nursing and cocked her head to listen with a calm look on her face, as if she, too, was taking in the great information Greg provided for making your own baby food. I look forward to introducing my daughter to the wonderful world of healthy homemade food as she becomes ready for solids. I'll also be looking into purchasing a ricer to keep it simple. Love the philsophy that Life Happens At the Table!

What a GREAT video.  I love how laid back and casual yet entertaining and educational it is.  I can't wait for the rest of the series.  Every parent should own this, and buy it for every new parent friend of theirs.
Truly a gem, thank you Chef and Father!

What a great video.  I cannot wait for more to follow. This informative, entertaining and masterfully created video is something that will remain on my bookshelf and in my kitchen for years. A must have for anyone who wants the best for their children in food and cooking.
